methods: abstract short acceptNode(Node nodeArg) This method will be called by the parser at the completion of the parsing of each node.
abstract int getWhatToShow() Tells the LSParser what types of nodes to show to the method LSParserFilter.acceptNode.
abstract short startElement(Element elementArg) The parser will call this method after each Element start tag has been scanned, but before the remainder of the Element is processed.
constants: short FILTER_INTERRUPT Interrupt the normal processing of the document.
short FILTER_REJECT Reject the node and its children.
short FILTER_SKIP Skip this single node.
